generator

Interface IGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGenerator, PIDGenerator

    public interface IGenerator
    Class used to generate the new generation of individuals at each evolutionary step.
    Author:
    Alessio Tonioni

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<IPopulationMember> getFirstGeneration(int size)
      Creates the first generation of individuals used to start the genetic algorithm
      java.util.List<IPopulationMember> getNewGeneration(java.util.List<IPopulationMember> currentGen)
      Creates the new generation from the old one, it takes the fittest member and tries to combine them to create a better generation.

    • Method Detail

      • getNewGeneration

        java.util.List<IPopulationMember> getNewGeneration(java.util.List<IPopulationMember> currentGen)
        Creates the new generation from the old one, it takes the fittest member and tries to combine them to create a better generation. A randomized mutation it's also introduced. The new generation has as much member as the old one.
        Parameters:
        currentGen -
        Returns:
        the new generation of individuals

      • getFirstGeneration

        java.util.List<IPopulationMember> getFirstGeneration(int size)
        Creates the first generation of individuals used to start the genetic algorithm
        Parameters:
        size - number of elements
        Returns:
